actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-221.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 388 - 15 (Record Vote No: 251).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2350) to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the authorities under that Act relating to the National Institutes of Health and the National Research Institutes, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2350 (health research authorization).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2350) to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the authorities under that Act relating to the National Institutes of Health and the National Research Institutes, and for other purposes.
